mapper.insert: MERGE tb_user_info AS T USING ( select user_id , 'SUPPLY' auth_cd from OPENQUERY(ERP_DL, ' select a.ID as user_id ,a.ID as company_cd ,b.NAME1 as company_nm from wjp.ZMMT2010 a inner join wjp.KNA1 b on a.ID = b.KUNNR where isnull(a.WERKS, '''') = '''' ') ) AS S ON (T.user_id = S.user_id COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(USER_ID, AUTH_CD) VALUES(S.user_id, S.auth_cd) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.user_id = S.user_id;
